this is a book review, but it does not show its potential on the government regulated sites, they tend to leave out the possibilities. read the key points.

The fields it generates anywhere other than right next to the antenna are much less than you get by being inside a house wired for electricity.
 
 Why it attracts any attention other than from geophysicists I have never understood.
 
 It's harmless.
